name: Beat Miner
description: Mine and collect ore blocks to the rhythm of your music in procedurally generated caves. Featuring many levels and different gameplay modes, Beat Miner will challenge your mining reflexes!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 or similar quad-core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Requires music library with compatible songs (view FAQ for more information on file compatibility)
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
